column2: I didn't find anything worth the trouble. It's basically a flavor-dense disk fried in butter
column3: then covered in too much heavy cheese to make any sense at all. It's basically a handheld casserole of very little flavor. There's no herbs
column5: just crusty buttery dough covered in cheese - then veggie
column7: and finally the sauce. It's a cheese casserole plain and simple. I even exchanged one just to be sure
column8: and they all taste the same.
